all_players_locator.desc: Script for locating players, requires Advanced peripherals and player detector

bomboclad_server.desc: Server script for explosions, requires modem

bomboclad_client.desc: Client script for explosions, requires modem

cftp.desc: CFTP (Computercraft File Transfer Protocol), this app can transfer files over rednet! Requires a modem btw, lol

rturtled.desc: RTurtleD (Remote Turtle Daemon) for remote controlling turtle, and doing bunch of stuff with it (requires turtle with modem)

rturtle-client.desc: RTurtle-Client (Remote Turtle client) for remote controlling turtle, and doing bunch of stuff with it (requires anything with modem, recommended using tablet)
